body:
Don't think I've ever done one of these before, figured i'd do one before the forums are gone

Most of you old members may remember me as X_Heat, xHeat, Heatless etc



ask away

replies.body:
Long time no see!! 

It's going pretty good, school is pretty stressful but I'm managing somehow lol

You were one of the first friends I made in Avi, you even took me in your team when I was really bad at PvP :P Really nice guy and always fun to talk to

She's a nice person to talk to every now and then when I see her in the hallways, although she hits me around sometimes :(

I'll dm you it on skype when I get on today

Haha, name is probably taken but I can surely join
